A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I give it one and a half stars for the cinematography which was great. However\, the story was really poorly done and inconsistent with both the force awakens and the original trilogy. Too many plot lines\, drama and random stuff to be considered a good movie. It plays more like a parody than a movie that takes itself seriously. I feel bad that so many people claim to like the movie as we will continue to get garbage like this from Disney due to fanboys loving anything with Star Wars in it... even if it’s trash like this one. Lastly\, what they did with Luke’s character is just irresponsible.
